title: True Strike
content:
True Strike Divination Cantrip Gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll. 2 turns 18m Concentration Action

Divination Cantrip

Gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll.

18m Concentration

True Strike is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. True Strike is a Cantrip from the Divination school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 True Strike Information

Description: Gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll. Level: C
